Huawei's Zurich Lab unveils SINQ, an open-source quantization method that it claims can reduce LLM memory use by 60-70% without significant quality loss  —  - Dual-Axis Scaling: Instead of using a single scale factor for quantizing a matrix, SINQ uses separate scaling vectors for rows and columns.

items.summary:
We have been tracking some notable launch deals on just about all of Apple’s new iPhone 17, 17 Pro, 17 Pro Max, and iPhone Air cases since shortly after launch. Amazon recently hit us with a countdown clock, suggesting all of those prices were about to jump back up, but it lied. While the deals on some of the colors on some of the models are indeed no more, there are still plenty of offers still live for folks looking to sheath their new Apple phone in and Apple cover. Scope it out below. 

more…

items.title: Kioxia, whose stock has more than tripled since its public debut in Tokyo last December, expects NAND storage demand to grow by ~20% annually amid the AI boom (Bloomberg)
items.summary:
Bloomberg:
Kioxia, whose stock has more than tripled since its public debut in Tokyo last December, expects NAND storage demand to grow by ~20% annually amid the AI boom  —  Kioxia Holdings Corp. anticipates demand for NAND storage will grow by roughly 20% each year as AI data center operators keep scaling up.

items.title: With its latest acqui-hire, OpenAI is doubling down on personalized consumer AI

items.title: Messy workshop or garage? This discounted tool organizer can help, now $50
items.summary:
POKIPO Large Power Tool Organizer

Buy for $50 (Reg. $60)

What we love

I took the time to craft a pegboard wall for all of my tools, but folks that want a heavy-duty solution that can hold “up to 400 pounds” should have a look at this unit. The entire unit spans 36.4 by 11.7 by 8 inches and is ready to be mounted on the wall.

items.title: This recently-released USB-C car charger delivers up to 175W of total power for $27
items.summary:
JOYROOM 175W USB-C Car Charger

Buy for $27 (Reg. $33)

Clip the on-page $6 off coupon.

What we love

This recent release is among some of most powerful car chargers we’ve come across. Offerings we’ve spotted from from Anker, UGREEN, and LISEN tend to top out with output no higher than 170W in total. This one goes a bit further at 175W. This is divvied up between two 100W and 45W Type-C ports in addition to a 30W USB-A.

I’ve said it before and I’ll say it again, when it comes to wearing a belt, ratcheting is the way to go. Unlike traditional offerings, you get a whole lot more flexibility. This particular unit has five adjustments per inch while typical belts only offer one or two.

Clip the on-page 24% off coupon.

While you can find MagSafe wallets and some Apple Find My cards for less, once you buy both, you’re likely to spend more. This all-in-one device packs Apple Find My integration, MagSafe, and even functions as a stand. Best of all, there’s room for “up to 6 cards.”
